description: This tool refers to issues arising from Outlook's unexpected addition of an app search bar above the message list. It is designed to help users understand and navigate the new layout that could disrupt their workflow. For comprehensive guidance, users should refer to the Microsoft support page linked in the post, which offers troubleshooting tips and potential adjustments to settings. Although this tool focuses on assessing user experience, it is linked with navigating application behaviors introduced by recent updates, specifically in relation to managing email effectively.
